/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The buildings lining the street are adorned with vibrant red and yellow awnings, adding a splash of color to the otherwise gray day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, going about their day. Vehicles, including cars and motorcycles, are parked along the street, hinting at the busy traffic typical of city life. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and vibrancy of the city.
